The Cowboy Channel NFR Coverage Schedule

NFR Event Schedule 2023 (NFR 9 to 5)

Sunday, December 3

Miss Rodeo America — Contestant Official Introductions

  • 9:30 a.m. — Doors open to the public
  • 10 a.m. — 11:30 a.m. — Official introductions and visit with Miss Rodeo America
  • South Point Showroom
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Monday, December 4

PRCA National Convention (Registration Available)

  • 12 p.m. — 4 p.m.
  • Early Registration and Contract Personnel Trade Show Set Up
  • South Point Convention Area & Exhibit Hall

Tuesday, December 5

PRCA National Convention (Registration Available)

  • 7 a.m. — 4 p.m.
  • South Point Convention Area

Miss Rodeo America — Horsemanship Competition sponsored by AQHA and Waddell & Reed

  • 7:30 a.m. — Doors open to the public
  • 8 a.m. — 12:30 p.m.
  • South Point Priefert Pavilion and Arena
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

PRCA General Session

  • 8 a.m. — 10 a.m.
  • South Point Ballroom

South Point Western Gift Show

  • November 29 and 30 from 9 a.m. — 6 p.m.
  • South Point Exhibit Hall
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

PRCA Breakout Sessions

  • 10 a.m. — 12 p.m.
  • South Point Ballroom

PRCA National Convention Contract Personnel Trade Show & JCCF Silent Auction

  • 12:30 p.m. — 4:30 p.m.
  • South Point Exhibit Hall
  • Convention Attendees Only

National Finals Breakaway Roping

  • 2 p.m.
  • South Point Arena and Equestrian Center
  • Ticket Required
  • Tickets available at South Point Box Office 702-797-8055 or southpointarena.com

Wednesday, December 6

PRCA National Convention (Registration Available)

  • 7 a.m. — 4 p.m.
  • South Point Convention Area

Thursday, December 7

  • Bull Riding, Bareback, and Saddle Bronc

  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Saturday, December 16

The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas — It’s All Here

  • 9 a.m. — 4 p.m.
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • **Co-located with the RMEF Hunter & Outdoor Christmas Expo

YETI Junior World Finals

  • 9 a.m. — 4:00 p.m.
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Wrangler Rodeo Arena
  • Pole Bending, Barrel Racing, Steer Wrestling, Team Roping, Tie-Down and Breakaway
  • Ticket Required

RMEF Calcutta

  • 10:15 a.m. — 11 a.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Cowboy Revival with host Shane Minor

  • 11:15 a.m. — 12:15 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Outside the Barrel with Flint Rasmussen

  • 12:30 p.m. — 1:30 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

NFR Tailgate Party

  • 1:30 p.m. — 4 p.m.
  • The Cowboy Channel Cowboy Christmas
  • Las Vegas Convention Center, South Halls
  • Ariat Rodeo Live Stage
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

@graph.name: NFR Complete Schedule 2023: Performance Date, Time, and Channel
Golam Muktadir
@graph.description: Golam Muktadir is a passionate sports fan and a dedicated movie buff. He has been writing about both topics for over a decade and has a wealth of knowledge and experience to share with his readers. Muktadir has a degree in journalism and has written for several well-known publications, including Surprise Sports.
